official_title: To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to extend the requirement for reciprocity in the approval of housing subdivisions.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to extend Federal agency reciprocity in the approval of a reasonable value determination by the Department of Veterans Affairs with regard to housing subdivisions. Makes such extension retroactive for approvals made between the enactment of the Department of Housing and Urban Development Reform Act of 1989 and the enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to extend the requirement for reciprocity in the approval of housing subdivisions.
